statement.tex: \text{What is the coefficient of }x^6y^3\text{ in}\\ \text{the expansion of }(x+y)^9?
\\ \textbf{Right or wrong?} \\ \text{The m-th term}-T_m-\text{in the expansion is}\ldots

reason.tex: \text{Given that }T_m = ^9C_m\cdot x^m\cdot y^{9-m}\text{, we can see}\\ \text{that we will get a }x^6y^3\text{ term when }m=6.\\ \text{Hence, we need the coefficient of }T_6 = ^9C_6 = 84.
